posts.post_content:
I need the following cards for my St. Louis Cardinal set.  I would prefer PSA or SGC 3 or 4 quality (or 2s with excellent eye appeal) but raw is also acceptable.  I'm trying to find as many different backs as I can afford (probably no Hindu, Uzit, Drum, Carolina Brights, Lenox, or Broadleaf right now) so I'd like to avoid Sweet Cap or Peidmont backs except on the Bresnahan and Willis cards.  Please let me know if you can help me. :)  Thanks!  

Jap Barbeau
Jack Bliss
Roger Bresnahan Batting
Bobby Byrne
Chappie Charles
Steve Evans
Billy Gilbert
Ed Konetchy Glove High
Charlie Rhodes
Al Shaw
Vic Willis Throwing
Vic Willis Batting
Steve Murray has an SGC 50 Evans for sale a few posts down. His handle is Jacklitsch. He's great to deal with.

I've managed to pick up Sweet Cap, Old Mill, and American Beauty backs.  I'm still looking for the above cards in Sovereign, Polar Bear, Cycle, EPDG, and Tolstoi (Hindu, Broadleaf, or Carolina Brights only if they are low grade and cheap but still display well).

Hi Chris,

Sent you a PM.
